verbose_text: Indeed, Cep126 depletion or the transfection with the 1-967 Cep126 deletion mutant did not affect p150Glued localisation, but induced mislocalisation of PCM1 and pericentrin.
evidence: Cep126 depletion or the transfection with the 1-967 Cep126 deletion mutant did not affect p150Glued localisation, but induced mislocalisation of PCM1
